name: Ch16BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Forde;Never thought I'd feel like a stranger approaching our own castle.|It looks different somehow... colder.
speak;Kyle;That's because it's in the hands of traitors and thieves.|But not for much longer.
speak;Kyle;By nightfall, our flag will fly over these walls again.|I swear it.
speak;Forde;Always so serious, Kyle.|But I can't disagree with you this time.
speak;Forde;Can you imagine how it will feel?|Sleeping in our own barracks again?|The training grounds, the kitchens...
speak;Kyle;The royal halls restored to their proper state...|It will be good to come home.
speak;Forde;Remember that chef who made those meat pies?|First thing I'm doing is checking if he's still there.|I've dreamed about those pies during every cold night on this campaign.
speak;Kyle;Ha!|Of course you're thinking about food at a time like this.
speak;Forde;A knight needs his strength!|Besides, we have to have something to look forward to after the battle, don't we?
speak;Kyle;Speaking of the battle...|Their forces are concentrated at the main gate and eastern wall.|It won't be easy.
speak;Forde;With you charging in like a madman?|I'd say their forces are the ones who'll have it rough.
speak;Kyle;I intend to fight with everything I have.|For Renais, for Prince Ephraim, and for those we've lost.
speak;Forde;For Franz and the others waiting for good news...|And for General Seth, who entrusted us with this vanguard position.
speak;Kyle;How many battles have we fought side by side, Forde?
speak;Forde;Too many to count.|Though I seem to remember saving your hide in most of them.
speak;Kyle;Your memory fails you, as usual.|I recall quite the opposite.
speak;Forde;Well, maybe we can settle it once and for all today.|How about a friendly wager?|Whoever takes down more enemies buys the drinks when we celebrate.
speak;Kyle;You're on.|Though I hope you brought enough gold.|Those tavern keepers in Renais know how to charge.
speak;Forde;Ha! Your confidence will be your downfall, Kyle!|I've been saving my energy this whole march.|You'll see my true skill today!
speak;Kyle;Just try to keep up with me.|And watch my back, as always.
speak;Forde;For Renais!|And for those meat pies!
